## Función de Densidad

$$
f(x)= \left\{
	       \begin{array}{ll}
		 \displaystyle \frac{\Gamma(\alpha +\beta)x^{\alpha-1}(1-x)^{\beta -1}}{\Gamma(\alpha)\Gamma(\beta)}      & \mathrm{si\ } 0 \le x \le 1 \\
		 0     & \mathrm{si\ } x \ne (0,1) 
	       \end{array}
	     \right.
$$


## Función de Distribución

$$
 F(x) = \left\{
	       \begin{array}{ll}
		 \displaystyle B(x,\alpha,\beta) &  \mathrm{si\ } 0 \le x \le 1 \\
		 0     & \mathrm{si\ } x \ne (0,1) 
	       \end{array}
	     \right.
$$

## Media

$$
E[X]= \frac{\alpha}{\alpha + \beta}
$$

## Varianza

$$
Var[X]= \displaystyle \frac{\alpha\beta}{(\alpha +\beta +1)(\alpha+\beta)^2}
$$
